item.title: [BHS][Web Hosting] - Migration Cluster051 to Cluster151
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 13, 2026, 09:30 - 11:30 UTC

Dec 24, 21:12 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Web Hosting offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 13/01/2026 09:30 UTC
End time : 13/01/2026 11:30 UTC
Service impact : During this maintenance, cluster015 will be temporarily unavailable for 2 hours maximum.
Outgoing gateway IP will change during maintenance, please find the new one here : https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/en-web-hosting-clusters-ip-addresses?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0052388
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a migration of cluster015 to cluster115.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GRA1][Collaborative solutions] - MX Plan incident notification
item.description:
Dec 25, 02:24 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our MX Plan offer has been resolved.

Start time : 25/12/2025 01:21 UTC
End time : 25/12/2025 02:15 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a hardware issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Dec 25, 01:52 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating an incident affecting our MX Plan offering, which is causing temporary issue in the region GRA1.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 25/12/2025 01:21 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : The MX Plan service is temporarily unavailable on File server 79.
Customers Impact : Some customers are temporarily unable to access their mailbox and they are also unable to send receive mails.
Please note that mails received during the incident will be stored and delivered after the incident is resolved.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Please find below an update on the situation:

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : The process of restoring emails is ongoing. Our teams have already restored 80.96% of mailboxes.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Dec 18, 19:56 UTC

Update : The process of restoring emails is ongoing. Our teams have already restored 63.70% of mailboxes.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 17/12/2025 06:00 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Emails received before 18th December are currently unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers can log in to their email accounts via webmail or email clients, and sending and receiving emails is working normally.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Dec 18, 11:47 UTC

item.title: [GLOBAL][VoIP] - Migration CLUSTER to CLUSTER
item.description:
Dec 15, 21:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Dec 6, 00:22 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our VoIP offer.

Start time : 15/12/2025 21:00 UTC
End time : 17/02/2026 22:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers will experience a 10 minute down during maintenance.
Service improvement : We need to upgrade the firmware on our Yealink phones. We need to realize 2 upgrade to install the good version of the firmware, except for the CP860 model where only 1 upgrade is enough. The maintenance campain will take several days at the same timeslot every day from 21:00 UTC to 22:00 UTC.
The planning for each model is as follows :

Yealink CP860 :
Single update date :15/12/2025

Yealink CP920 :
First update date :14/01/2025
Second update date :15/01/2025

Yealink T41P :
First update date :19/01/2025
Second update date :20/01/2025

Yealink T41S :
First update date :21/01/2025
Second update date :22/01/2025

Yealink T46G :
First update date :26/01/2025
Second update date :27/01/2025

Yealink T46S :
First update date :28/01/2025
Second update date :29/01/2025

Yealink T53 :
First update date :02/02/2025
Second update date :03/02/2025

Yealink T53W :
First update date :04/02/2025
Second update date :05/02/2025

Yealink W56P :
First update date :09/02/2025
Second update date :10/02/2025

Yealink W60P & W53P :
First update date :11/02/2025
Second update date :12/02/2025

For Enterprise and Business customer, all models concerned :
First update date :16/02/2025
Second update date :17/02/2025

Thank you for your understanding.
